# GitHub Sponsors and Funding

## Support This Project

If the Platform9 Management System has been helpful to your organization, consider supporting the project:

### GitHub Sponsors
GitHub Sponsors allows you to support open source developers. You can enable this in your repository settings.

### Ko-fi (Optional)
For additional support options, you can use Ko-fi or similar platforms.
